name: industrially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in factories, or in a way that is related to industry: I don't like those fancy bags of industrially produced salad. Industrially advanced countries are increasingly dependent on science and technology. See
industrial
More examplesFewer examplesMelamine is a chemical normally used industrially.Industrially, it is easy to remove ammonia.Nine-tenths of all the wood we use industrially is softwood.
